description: Defines Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) for authentication-related operations such as signup, login, and token response in the backend API.

classes.name: AuthDtos
classes.description: Container class for authentication DTOs including signup, login, and token response.

methods.name: SignupRequest
methods.description: A record representing a signup request with email and display name.

methods.name: LoginRequest
methods.description: A record representing a login request with email.

methods.name: TokenResponse
methods.description: A record representing the response containing an access token.
